name: turbaned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
wearing a turban (= a head covering worn especially by some men for religious reasons): a turbaned man The crowd was led by at least a dozen turbaned clerics.
(especially of a woman) wearing a head covering that resembles a turban: Her turbaned head sprouted a peacock feather. See
turban
More examplesFewer examples A steady stream of thousands of turbaned men entered the high school."I'm Ranjit Singh Mahwala," the turbaned man introduced himself.The man smiled and bent his turbaned head to listen.Six turbanned Sikhs sat chanting prayers.She turned her turbaned head discreetly in another direction. She was wrapped in his bath towel and had another towel turbanned around her hair.
